chat.welcome: Welcome to the Portfolio Analysis Assistant. I can help you analyze portfolios, provide market insights, and answer investment-related questions.

examples.tech: Analyze the performance of a tech stock portfolio
examples.createPortfolio: Help me create a portfolio: 40% AAPL, 30% MSFT, 20% GOOGL, 10% AMZN
examples.techAllocation: How should I allocate among US large-cap tech stocks?

chat.disclaimer: The investment assistant can provide analysis and suggestions, but does not constitute investment advice. Please consult a professional for investment decisions.
chat.apiKeyRequired: Please set your Perplexity API key first. Click the settings icon in the top right corner to set it up.
chat.apiCallFailed: API call failed. Please check your API key is correct, or try again later.
chat.apiKeyInvalid: The API key you provided is invalid or has expired. Please update your API key.
chat.apiRateLimited: Too many requests, API access is rate limited. Please wait a moment and try again.
chat.networkError: Network connection error, unable to connect to the API server. Please check your network connection.
chat.backendError: Failed to send to backend. Please check if the API connection is working properly, or try again later.
chat.portfolioSent: Portfolio successfully sent to the backend.
chat.defaultMockResponse: I am an AI assistant in test mode, I will provide simulated responses based on your input.
chat.mockPortfolioResponse: I have created a tech stock portfolio for you, this is a test response.
chat.sendMessage: Send a message to PremiaLab AI...
chat.aiDisclaimer: AI may make mistakes. Please verify important information.
chat.welcomeTitle: I'm PremiaLab AI, nice to meet you!
chat.welcomeDescription: I can help you analyze portfolios, provide market insights, and answer investment-related questions.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Enter your Perplexity API key below. You can get an API key from the Perplexity website.
settings.emptyApiKeyError: API key cannot be empty. Please enter a valid key.
settings.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please re-enter your API key.

dashboard.title: Portfolio Analysis Dashboard
dashboard.description: Comprehensive analysis of portfolio performance, risk, and asset allocation

errors.loadAllocationFailed: Failed to load asset allocation data
